meta.title: Translation company for online translation services
meta.description: Localistars is a website where companies can find high-quality online translation services performed by freelance translators.

section.subTitle: We are about transparency and trust.
section.title: Localization done directly with your partner

findBest.title: Find the best offer
findBest.text:
Client: Choose the best fitting translators.
Translator: Bid for suitable translation jobs of clients.
As client you accept bids based on price and experience of the translator. As translator you cherry-pick the projects you want to work on.

directContact.title: Direct contact
directContact.text: There is no middleman – you get direct access to the experts. No annoying text monitoring or filtering. As client you may choose to collaborate with the same translators for future projects and grow your own team.

contentCentric.title: Content-centric
contentCentric.text: It's all about the content. Projects are set-up with content in mind so the localistars can work together effectively. Clients want to reach their global audience while translators want to choose from diverse tasks. We heard you both.

riskFree.title: Risk-free payment
riskFree.text: As a localistar you don't need to worry about your payment. Clients will only be charged if they approve the content provided by a translator. Translators always get paid on approval.

video.title: localistars teaser
video.text: Check out how localistars works and you will get your translation job done with our marketplace.

service.title: Efficient translation<1/>services & platform
service.text: Localistars is a easy-to-use translation company<1/> that allows businesses of all sizes to purchase cost-effective translations using their translation-platform.

ms1.title: Competitive pricing
ms1.text: We are not a translation agency - we are a platform, so it's also not our pricing but your pricing.

ms2.title: Define your language pair
ms2.text: You may easily create a project where translators can apply, and then you simply choose the language pair and localistars will notify the appropriate translators for you.

ms3.title: High quality
ms3.text: All of your translation requirements may be met with a single simple solution. Submit your translation job now and receive bids, so you can choose from quick, high-quality translators in almost every language.

first.tabTitle: Maximize the internationalization <br className='d-none d-xs-block' /> of your website

w1.title: Localistars
w1.text: Order your translations online<br class='d-none d-xs-block'>for your project or website.

w2.title: Localization
w2.text: Manage translation and development seperately <br class='d-none d-xs-block'> and enhance the internationalization of your company.

second.tabTitle: Our platform handles<br className='d-none d-xs-block' />everything for you<br className='d-none d-xs-block' />

third.tabTitle: Use localistars for <br className='d-none d-xs-block' />any kind of business<br className='d-none d-xs-block' />

promo.title: Find the best translator that suits your need<br className='d-none d-lg-block'/>

cta.title:
Register as
translator or as translation company
for free below
cta.text: *No fees for issuing tenders or bidding! No obligations!

meta.title: Find a translator on our platform
meta.description: On our online platform, you can hire a professional translator for your company's language translation project.

hero.title:
Why should you choose
a localistar translator?
hero.description: We provide a platform that removes the tedious parts of translations.

service.subTitle: Advantages
service.title: For companies looking for a translator
service.text: Let localistars marketplace do the tedious parts of your translation workflow.

as1.title: Find new translators with ease
as1.text: Stay on top of your task lists and stay in touch with what's happeningMore time to get projects done, less time wasted on searching and contracting. Overall localistars is your chance to up your time to market.

as2.title: Direct Contact
as2.text: localistars is about you. You're in direct contact with the translator – it's your project, you hold the reins. In contrast to other services we DON'T set the price and therefore we DON'T forward the contract to the cheapest translator to maximize our own profit. You choose the translator for your projects yourself, it's your contractor.

as3.title: Invoicing
as3.text: No need to waste time managing invoices. It's all done automatically and VAT-compliant. You can download the documents for your accounting anytime. Focus on your job – not on bookkeeping.

as4.title: Keep the overview
as4.text: Find all the information in one place. No need to skim through endless lists of emails.

content.subTitle: Few clicks away
content.title: Find the right translator for your need
content.text: You can post your requests in our translation marketplace for free and receive bids from translators within hours. This service is provided to you at no cost.

widget.title: Freelance or agency translators
widget.text: Within hours, you can get a high-quality translation from a professional translator or professional translation company.

manage.subTitle: Individual management
manage.title: Manage your team
manage.text: You can add all your team-members to your organisation. Each user can be granted individual rights so they get access to the relevant parts of your workflow. Keep working with partners you trust.

about.subTitle: Productivity increase
about.title: Versatile API
about.text: Automate your process for being more productive.

process.subTitle: Get started
process.title: It's very easy to start <1/> follow this process

sp1.title: Sign up
sp1.text: Complete the registration process by confirming your email address. Click on the link in the received email.

sp2.title: Select your profile type
sp2.text: You are searching for a translator! Choose the client profile type.

sp3.title: Update your personal profile
sp3.text: Time to make yourself a name - complete your personal user profile.

sp4.title: Having an organization
sp4.text: Providing an organization is mandatory. A contract is legally between your organization and the service requesting organization. You can either get invited to an existing organization or create a new one.

sp5.title: Create a project and call for bids
sp5.text: Time to make yourself a name - complete your personal profile.

help.subTitle: HELP
help.title: Do you require some assistance before you register?
help.text: Any question you may have about our pricing or platform will be answered by one of our team members.

meta.title: Freelance Translator Website: Find a job
meta.description: On our website you will find freelance opportunities for language translation. Apply for the next translation job online.

hero.title: Why should you become<1/>a localistars translator?
hero.text: Our goal is to provide a platform that removes the tedious parts of translations. Are you a freelance translator or a translation agency, then localistars is for you!

service.subTitle: Services
service.title: Why should you become a localistars translator?
service.text: Our goal is to provide a platform that removes the tedious parts of translations. Are you a freelance translator or a translation agency, then localistars is for you!

ms1.title: Direct Contact
ms1.text: localistars is about you. You're in direct contact with the client – it's your task, you hold the reins. In contrast to other services we DON'T set the price and therefore we DON'T forward the contract to the cheapest translator to maximize our own profit. You make an offer, it's your client – all we ask for is a small service fee on success to cover our own costs (transactions, currency exchange and development).

ms2.title: No risk
ms2.text: We only charge you a small service fee on successful payment. No hidden costs.

ms3.title: Invoicing
ms3.text: No need to waste time writing invoices. It's all done automatically and VAT-compliant. You can download the documents for your accounting anytime. Focus on your job – not on bookkeeping.

ms4.title: Get paid
ms4.text: A project has to be funded by your client upfront. We hold back the money until the job is done and the client approves the translations. Then we'll transfer the sum to your account.

ms5.title: Find new clients with ease
ms5.text: More time to do the meaningful work, less time wasted on searching and contracting. Overall localistars is your chance to increase your income.

ms6.title: Keep the overview
ms6.text: Find all the information in one place. No need to skim through endless lists of emails.

w1.title: Your language profile
w1.text: New job opportunities matching your language profile are waiting for you.

w2.title: Marketing
w2.text: Expand your personal reach <br class='d-none d-xs-block'> with the free possibility to list here.

hero.subTitle: Translation Marketplace
hero.title: We connect clients<1/>with translators
hero.description: localistars is the go-to marketplace for clients and translators to get translation jobs done. <1/> As client you'll find translators and as translator you'll find translation jobs. Direct contact, no middleman – just collaborating localistars!
hero.text: localistars is the go-to marketplace for clients and translators to get translation jobs done.<1/>As client you'll find translators and as translator you'll find translation jobs. Direct contact, no middleman – just localistars working together!

footer.desc: We’re a translation marketplace for companies and individuals searching for a translator as well as for freelance translators or translator agencies who are looking for a job.
footer.socialText: Get the latest trends and updates right at your inbox.
